categories: Category:Imperial Navy captains of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Holt was a Human male who served as Captain in the Imperial Navy during the Galactic Civil War. In 3 ABY, he served aboard the Super Star Destroyer Executor during the time of the Battle of Hoth.

Captain Holt first appeared in the 2010 published graphic novella Star Wars Adventures: The Will of Darth Vader, which was written by Tom Taylor.
The penciller of this comic was Brian Koschak.
